sourcesContent:
List des Enfants

Liste des enfants
Nom Prenom Age niveau Action
{{enfant.nom}} {{enfant.prenom}} {{enfant.age}} {{enfant.niveau}}
import { HttpService } from './../../services/http.service'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list-enfants', templateUrl: './list-enfants.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list-enfants.component.css'] }) export class ListEnfantsComponent implements OnInit { enfants : any[]=[]; constructor(private httpService : HttpService , ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getEnfants(); } delete(id : any){ this.enfants=this.enfants.filter((f)=> f.id !== id) this.httpService.authDelete("parent/"+id).subscribe({ next : (data : any)=>{ } }) } getEnfants(){ this.httpService.authGet("enfant") .subscribe({ next: (data: any) => { this.enfants= data.body; console.log(this.enfants) }, error: error => console.log(error) }); } }
